Hidden Figures

Rank: 215


Three female African-American mathematicians play a pivotal role in astronaut John Glenn's launch into orbit while dealing with racial and gender discrimination.


Director: Theodore Melfi

Writer: Allison Schroeder, Theodore Melfi, Margot Lee Shetterly

Stars: Taraji P. Henson, Octavia Spencer, Janelle Mon√°e

Tags: Docudrama, Biography, Drama, History
